name: Chess Minis ∙ Play & Learn
description:
Chess Minis has launched World Wide! Solve fun handcrafted puzzles or play online and collect 3D Chess sets designed by amazing artists. Play completely free with NO ADS!

NO ADS CHESS
Play free with no ads interrupting you, ever!

SOLVE 500+ HANDCRAFTED PUZZLES
Play puzzles that are full of tricky, but elegant solutions. From beginner to expert, play to learn, train for just for fun!

ONLINE 1v1 WORLDWIDE
Match live online with other players or duel your friends locally. Win to climb the League Leaderboards!

COLLECT & CUSTOMIZE
Earn rewards by playing any mode. Unlock unique, cool Chess Sets, Gloves & Emotes created by amazing artists from around the world.

JOIN SQUADS WITH FRIENDS
Start exclusive clubs with family & friends from real life or new players you meet in Chess Minis. Analyze your games, play rock paper scissors, trade or just hangout!



Support
Join our Discord to get help on any questions! https://discord.gg/gVe2ZfZVeb
Email us if you are experiencing an issue! help@classicsf5.com
